name: CustomerPaymentMethod_GetCustomerPaymentMethodBycustomerIdcustomerPaymentMethodId
description: Get one specific Customer payment method for one specific customer. ScreenId=AR303010

erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

$ul: **active**: The top part > Active > A check box that indicates (if selected) that the selected customer payment method is active (that is, available for recording payments).
**cardOrAccountNo**: The top part > Card/account no. > The identifier for the customer's payment method.

**cashAccount**: The top part > Cash account > The cash account to accrue customer payments made by this payment method, if it differs from the default cash account specified for the payment method selected.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**customer**: Mandatory field: The top part > Customer* > The customer whose payment method you want to view or add; select a customer from the list of customers defined in the system.
**name**: Click the magnifier > The displayed name

**paymentMethod**: Mandatory field: The top part > Payment method* > The payment method used as a template for a customer payment method you are currently viewing; select a payment method to use its settings for creating a new customer payment method.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**paymentMethodDetails**: Payment method details tab > The specific elements on this tab depend on the selected payment method, which is defined in the window.
